definition: to learn sth over again/to review/to brush up/to revive (memories, friendship etc)
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to revive old dreams (idiom); to relive past experiences

sentences.english: You just always review on your old little screen.
sentences.chinese: 你都可在自己的小荧幕上重温。

sentences.english: If two people are meant to be together , eventually they ' ll find their wat back.
sentences.chinese: 如果两个人注定在一起，他们总会找到重温旧路的梦。

sentences.english: I, in turn, kept trying to relive my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我则在不断试图重温我的孩提时代。

sentences.english: Need to brush up on your financial management know-how? Read Fundamentals of Financial Management by Eugene F.
sentences.chinese: 需要重温一下你的财务管理知识吗？

sentences.english: We planned to visit old haunts, the area we’d once called home.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划重温那时待过的地方，我们当时称其为家。

sentences.english: Unlock bonus challenges and re-play puzzles and mini-games.
sentences.chinese: 解锁奖励挑战，重温谜题个小游戏。

sentences.english: As I reread the transcripts at this remove the source of his pleasure is not self-evident.
sentences.chinese: 我重温这部分记录时不明白是什么使他高兴。

sentences.english: I want to get back with her. But I'm not going to grovel.
sentences.chinese: 我想和她重温旧情，但我不会低三下四求她的。

sentences.english: I relived that fateful day over and over in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 我在思想上不断地重温着那决定不幸命运的日子。

sentences.english: I’ve been meaning to review this book for weeks. I have a love/hate relationship with it.
sentences.chinese: 几周以来我一直想重温这本书，对它的感觉爱恨交杂。

sentences.english: He knew he was asking many to revisit a nightmare.
sentences.chinese: 他知道，他是在请求许多人重温恶梦。

sentences.english: Bob is eager to review the previous Superman kind of go through fire and life.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃十分渴望重温以前那种出生入死的超人生活。
杰米重温了他祖父的一生。

sentences.english: Can't repeat the past?" he cried incredulously."
sentences.chinese: “不能重温旧梦？”他大不以为然地喊到。

sentences.english: Thinking, but also review the kind of long-lost childhood delicious, heart Le Zizi's.
sentences.chinese: 想着，又可重温儿时那种久违的美味，心里乐滋滋的。

sentences.english: Enjoy the thrill of being somewhere new and take the opportunity to reconnect sexually.
sentences.chinese: 好好享受在新地方的激动，抓住机会重温美好的性爱。

definition: to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to commemorate/to recall fondly/to think of the past
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
to waken (to action)/to rouse (the masses)/to evoke (attention, recollection etc)
fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
